PAPIER-MACHE HAND MIRRORS WITHOUT HANDLES.

In the stunning display of Papier-Mache, comes a gorgeous hand mirror for your handbag to carry in. Every lady should have a mirror handy in her bag. Comfortable to carry this beautiful hand mirror is an absolute must have for every gorgeous lady!

Material:
    Mirror , Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

Kashmir Paper-Mache is a handicraft involving the transformation of paper pulp into intricately decorated artefacts such as Papier-Mache boxes, bowls, elephant models, cups and numerous other handy objects. These colourful hanging items comes in the shape of an cate, elephants, camels, horses, birds etc they come together to form a beautiful set which sways across your home. These hangings uses a material of mashed and hardened waste paper. The items are crafted in a fun mix of colours and within the realms of Kashmiri Paper Mache. This is achieved by magical hands which later lends its charm to your living space.
